data.title: News of Chung Hwa Middle School
data.meta_description: Excellent O’ Level Results in Chung Hwa Middle School, BSB             In the recently-released O’ Level results, Chung Hwa students again made the school proud by passing the public examinations with flying colours. Among the high-flyers, Ang Chorng Kae , Lowell Lee Tuan Lun, Leong Suk Chin and Isabella Lau Kar Lye topped the outstanding…
data.text:
Excellent O’ Level Results in Chung Hwa Middle School, BSB

In the recently-released O’ Level results, Chung Hwa students again made the school proud by passing the public examinations with flying colours. Among the high-flyers, Ang Chorng Kae , Lowell Lee Tuan Lun, Leong Suk Chin and Isabella Lau Kar Lye topped the outstanding charts with 9As. 5 students scored 8AS while 14 students scored 7As. A total of 44 students from the school also scored 5As and above.

The school was delighted by the overall improvement, notably in Physics where all its students scored a credit or above; Add. Maths and Chemistry where 98.6% scored a credit or above. English subject also recorded a marked improvement of 9.2% as 71.8% of its students scored a credit and above. The school also achieved 100% passing rate in Add. Maths, Physics and Biology.

The principal Mdm. Kho Guik Lan was impressed by the remarkable achievements of her students. “The success is due to the resolute effort of teachers and all students who go all out to attain perfection under a good school environment conducive for learning,” she explained.

She also thanked the school board of directors for their support in developing the hardware and software of the school. “In conjunction with the school’s 90th anniversary, the school board of directors spares no expenses in providing the best learning facilities in tandem with the school’s ultimate objective to mould well-rounded multilingual talent under the National Education Philosophy.

“Credit should also be given to parents for their support to the school,” she concluded. The top scorers of the school are as above:
